00001 #include "StimParams.h"
00002 #include "Util.h"
00003 #include <QTextStream>
00004 #include <QRegExp>
00005 #include <QFile>

00007 void StimParams::fromString(const QString & instr)
00008 {
00009     QString instrcpy (instr);
00010     QTextStream ts(&instrcpy, QIODevice::ReadOnly|QIODevice::Text);
00011     QString line;
00012     clear();
00013 
00014     // now parse remaining lines which should be name/value pairs
00015     while ( !(line = ts.readLine()).isNull() ) {
00016         line = line.trimmed();
00017         QRegExp re_comments("((;)|(#)|(//)).*");
00018         if (line.contains(re_comments)) {
00019             Debug() << "Comment found and skipped: `" << re_comments.cap(0) << "'";
00020             line.replace(re_comments, "");
00021             line = line.trimmed();
00022         }
00023         if (!line.length()) continue;
00024         QRegExp re("([^=]+)=(.*)");
00025         if (re.exactMatch(line)) {
00026             QString name = re.cap(1).trimmed(), value = re.cap(2).trimmed();
00027             
00028             Debug() << "parsed name=value: '" << name << "'='" << value << "'";
00029             (*this)[name] = value;
00030         } else {
00031             Debug() << "did not parse, setting '" << line << "'=''";
00032             (*this)[line] = "";
00033         }
00034     }
00035 }
00036 
00037 QString StimParams::toString() const
00038 {
00039     QString ret("");
00040     QTextStream ts(&ret, QIODevice::WriteOnly|QIODevice::Append|QIODevice::Text);
00041     for (const_iterator it = begin(); it != end(); ++it) 
00042         ts << it.key() << " = " << it.value().toString() << "\n";
00043     ts.flush();
00044     return ret;
00045 }
00046 
00047 bool StimParams::fromFile(const QString & fn)
00048 {
00049     QFile f(fn);
00050     if (!f.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly|QIODevice::Text)) return false;
00051     QString line, str("");
00052     QTextStream ts(&f), strts(&str, QIODevice::WriteOnly|QIODevice::Append|QIODevice::Text);
00053     while ( !(line = ts.readLine()).isNull() ) {
00054         strts << line << "\n";
00055     }
00056     strts.flush();
00057     fromString(str);
00058     return true;
00059 }
